info.title: Service for namespace ODataDemo
info.description:
This service is located at [https://localhost/service-root/](https://localhost/service-root/)

## Entity Data Model
![ER Diagram](https://yuml.me/diagram/class/[Product{bg:orange}],[Product]-0..1>[Category],[Product]-0..1>[Supplier],[Category{bg:orange}],[Category]-*>[Product],[Supplier{bg:orange}],[Supplier]++-[Address],[Supplier]-*>[Product],[Address],[Products{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Product],[Categories{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Category],[Suppliers{bg:dodgerblue}]++-*>[Supplier],[GetProductsByRating{bg:dodgerblue}]-*>[Product])

### Legend
![Legend](https://yuml.me/diagram/plain;dir:TB;scale:60/class/[External.Type{bg:whitesmoke}],[ComplexType],[EntityType{bg:orange}],[EntitySet/Singleton/Operation{bg:dodgerblue}])

post.description: Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

schema.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET Products HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)
